data.title: Lutheran South Academy
data.text:
Our mission is to assist students and parents as they transition through high school and into post-secondary education and/or the work force. We are here to guide, counsel, challenge, suggest and inform. We work with students as individuals to understand who they are beyond the classroom and help them find the "right fit."

The college counselors meet with students individually and in groups to establish goals and develop four-year high school graduation plans. Each year, the college counseling office hosts college admission advisor visits, seminars, and parent meetings, all designed to give every student and family the information needed to maximize their high school academic experience and navigate the college admission and financial aid process.

College Presentations on Campus
